definitions.definition: A semisynthetic form of penicillin C 16 H 19 N 3 O 4 S that is effective against gram-negative and gram-positive bacteria and is used to treat infections of the urinary , respiratory , and intestinal tracts .

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A semisynthetic form of penicillin C 16 H 19 N 3 O 4 S that is effective against gram-negative and gram-positive bacteria and is used to treat infections of the urinary , respiratory , and intestinal tracts .
